mapper.sql: b.brand_id AS brandId, b.company, b.country, b.name, b.description, b.found_date AS foundDate, b.kind, b.hit_counter AS hitCounter, b.image_path AS imagePath, b.score, b.create_by AS "createBy.userId", b.create_date AS createDate, b.update_by AS "updateBy.userId", b.update_date AS updateDate
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM brand b ORDER BY b.brand_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO brand(company, country, name, description, found_date, hit_counter, kind, image_path, score, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date) VALUES(#{company}, #{country}, #{name}, #{description}, #{foundDate}, #{hitCounter}, #{kind}, #{imagePath}, #{score}, #{createBy.userId}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.userId}, #{updateDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE brand SET company = #{company}, country = #{country}, name = #{name}, description = #{description}, found_date = #{foundDate}, hit_counter = #{hitCounter}, kind = #{kind}, image_path = #{imagePath}, score = #{score}, update_by = #{updateBy.userId}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE brand_id = #{brandId}
